title: CONNECTING TO GAME ISSUE
body: Ive been playing league the last 2 hours today and its been working just fine. Then randomly upon starting a new game right after champ select when youre suppose to go the champion loading screen to load into the game all I saw was a black screen. After waiting a few minutes a note saying connection error popped up, I tried restarting client and my laptop but it just kept happening. I was trying the whole game to fix it but couldn't, then randomly the new honor screen to honor one of my 4 teammates appeared, I clicked next and I was in the end game screen and I saw all my team say to report me. Nothing like this has ever happened before and I'm afraid to enter another game because of it. I tried a custom game right after just with myself and I loaded in fine just like normal so no idea what went wrong or if it will happen again. Really hope I don't get leaver buster because of this issue out of my control.

replies.body:
I have same problem.  I Was playing ranked today when the loading screen froze and when I alt tabbed out it said conection error When i finaly reconect it was too late, The game was End with Remake, and i was banned from the loot.  A little unfair Cause that problem was out of my control. :/
Will be good if i can recive some help from admins about this case.

It sounds like this might have been a weird little hiccup in your connection if you were able to load into a custom game just fine afterward. Let's take a couple precautions first by checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case something went a little haywire in there. Test it out in another custom or practice match and hit me back up if you're still having problems.
